      • clearThumbnailsCache

        public static void clearThumbnailsCache(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        The thumbnails cached is not cleared when logging out a session because many sessions share the same thumbnails. This method must be called when performing an application logout i.e. logging out of all sessions.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the application context

      • saveBitmap

        Save a bitmap to the local cache it could be used for unsent media to allow them to be resent.
        Parameters:

        defaultFileName - the filename is provided, if null, a filename will be generated

      • saveFileMediaForUrl

        public void saveFileMediaForUrl(java.lang.String mediaUrl,
                                java.lang.String fileUrl,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                java.lang.String mimeType)
        Replace a media cache by a file content. MediaUrl is the same model as the one used in loadBitmap.
        Parameters:
        mediaUrl - the mediaUrl
        fileUrl - the file which replaces the cached media.
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        mimeType - the mimeType.

      • saveFileMediaForUrl

        public void saveFileMediaForUrl(java.lang.String mediaUrl,
                                java.lang.String fileUrl,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                java.lang.String mimeType,
                                boolean keepSource)
        Copy or Replace a media cache by a file content. MediaUrl is the same model as the one used in loadBitmap.
        Parameters:
        mediaUrl - the mediaUrl
        fileUrl - the file which replaces the cached media.
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        keepSource - keep the source file

                                            android.widget.ImageView imageView,

        Load an avatar thumbnail. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:

        imageView - Ihe imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        side - the avatar thumbnail side
        Returns:

      • loadAvatarThumbnail

                                            android.widget.ImageView imageView,

                                            int side,
                                            android.graphics.Bitmap aDefaultAvatar)

        Parameters:
        hsConfig - the home server config.
        imageView - Ihe imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        side - the avatar thumbnail side
        aDefaultAvatar - the avatar to use when the Url is not reachable.
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached else null.

      • loadBitmap

        public java.lang.String loadBitmap(HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                   android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   int rotationAngle,
                                   int orientation,
                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                   EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from the url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        imageView - The imageView to update with the image.
        url - the image url
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached else null.

      • loadBitmap

        public java.lang.String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                   HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   int rotationAngle,
                                   int orientation,
                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                   EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from the url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        context - The context
        url - the image url
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached.

      • loadBitmap

        public java.lang.String loadBitmap(HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                   android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   int rotationAngle,
                                   int orientation,
                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                   EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are positive, download a thumbnail. rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE when undefined : the EXIF metadata must be checked.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - The home server config.
        imageView - The imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached

      • downloadIdFromUrl

        public java.lang.String downloadIdFromUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Returns the download ID from the media URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the media url
        Returns:
        the download ID if there is a pending download or null

      • downloadMedia

        public java.lang.String downloadMedia(android.content.Context context,
                                      HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType,
                                      EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Download a media.

        hsConfig - the home server config.
        url - the media url
        mimeType - the media mimetype
        encryptionInfo - the encryption information
        Returns:
        the download identifier if there is a pending download else null

      • downloadMedia

        public java.lang.String downloadMedia(android.content.Context context,
                                      HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType,
                                      EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo,
                                      IMXMediaDownloadListener listener)
        Download a media.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        hsConfig - the home server config.
        url - the media url
        mimeType - the media mimetype
        encryptionInfo - the encryption information
        listener - the encryption information
        Returns:

      • loadBitmap

        public java.lang.String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                   HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                   android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   int rotationAngle,
                                   int orientation,
                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                   java.io.File folderFile,
                                   EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are positive, download a thumbnail.

        The rotation angle is checked first. If rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, check the orientation is defined to a valid value. If the orientation is defined, request the properly oriented image to the server

        Parameters:
        context - the context
        hsConfig - the home server config
        imageView - the imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        folderFile - the folder where the media should be stored
        encryptionInfo - the encryption file information.
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached

      • loadBitmap

        public java.lang.String loadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                   HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                                   android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   int rotationAngle,
                                   int orientation,
                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                   java.io.File folderFile,
                                   android.graphics.Bitmap aDefaultBitmap,
                                   EncryptedFileInfo encryptionInfo)
        Load a bitmap from an url. The imageView image is updated when the bitmap is loaded or downloaded. The width/height parameters are optional. If they are positive, download a thumbnail.

        The rotation angle is checked first. If rotationAngle is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE, check the orientation is defined to a valid value. If the orientation is defined, request the properly oriented image to the server

        Parameters:
        context - the context
        hsConfig - the home server config
        imageView - the imageView to fill when the image is downloaded
        url - the image url
        width - the expected image width
        height - the expected image height
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle (degrees)
        orientation - the orientation (ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_XXX value)
        mimeType - the mimeType.
        folderFile - the folder where the media should be stored
        aDefaultBitmap - the default bitmap to use when the url media cannot be retrieved.
        encryptionInfo - the file encryption info
        Returns:
        a download identifier if the image is not cached
